scripts.build-js: mkdir -p static/js && cp source/js/waitingDialog.js static/js/waitingDialog.js && browserify source/js/malscc.js -o static/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties ] ]
scripts.watch-js: mkdir -p static/js && cp source/js/waitingDialog.js static/js/waitingDialog.js && watchify source/js/malscc.js -o static/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties ] ]
scripts.clean: rm -rf static/css && mkdir -p static/css && rm -rf static/js && mkdir -p static/js && rm -rf static/img && rm -rf static/model-data && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && cp -r source/img static/img && cp -r source/model-data static
scripts.build-dist: npm run build && mkdir dist && cp -r static/* dist && pug source/templates/index.pug -o dist && cp source/js/waitingDialog.js dist/js
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-js" "nodemon server -e js,pug" "cp -r source/img static/img" "cp -r source/model-data static" "cp source/js/waitingDialog.js static/js"
